title: The Wolf Among Us 1-5
description:
Year : 2014 
Genre : Adventure / 3D / 3rd Person 
Developer : Telltale Games 
Publisher: Telltale Games

Publication Type : License 
Language Text : English 
Language voice : English 
Medicine : Present (CODEX)

        Description:
     The Wolf Among Us will be a prequel to the comic book Fables (which emit DC Vertigo) and will consist of several parts. In the world of games and comic characters known fairy tales have been transferred in a gloomy New York, where they had perforce to settle down in a harsh society people. The protagonist of The Wolf Among Us will be BIGBUY Wolf (Bigby Wolf - ie, Big Bad Wolf, Angry gray wolf classic fairy tales of Little Red Riding Hood and the Three Little Pigs), which is now a hardened detective in New York. Although Wolfe is the human form, inside the lives bloodthirsty beast which the detective have to restrain

* Episode 1: Faith 

* Episode 2: Smoke and Mirrors 

* Episode 3: A Crooked Mile
 
* Episode 4: In Sheep's Clothing 

* Episode 5 : Cry Wolf
